content.value:
Someone’s sexuality or gender identity does not affect their rights to equality. 

If you do not accept this then you are a bigot and I will judge on that basis. There is no “Yeah, but” here.
content.html: Someone’s sexuality or gender identity does not affect their rights to equality. If you do not accept this then you are a bigot and I will judge on that basis. There is no “Yeah, but” here.
